docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version. Users are recommended to use API v2 as future versions of Foreman will change the default to v2 and then deprecate and/or remove v1. You may explicitly use v1 by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: index

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: create
examples:
POST /api/lookup_keys
{
  "lookup_key": {
    "key": "testkey",
    "is_param": true
  }
}
201
{
  "lookup_key": {
    "created_at": "2014-08-07T20:40:28Z",
    "default_value": null,
    "description": null,
    "id": 1018350796,
    "is_param": true,
    "key": "testkey",
    "key_type": null,
    "lookup_values_count": 0,
    "override": false,
    "path": "fqdn\nhostgroup\nos\ndomain",
    "puppetclass_id": null,
    "required": false,
    "updated_at": "2014-08-07T20:40:28Z",
    "validator_rule": null,
    "validator_type": null
  }
}

methods.name: update

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: destroy

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
DELETE /api/lookup_keys/980190962-port
200
{
  "lookup_key": {
    "created_at": "2014-08-07T20:40:10Z",
    "default_value": "80",
    "description": null,
    "id": 980190962,
    "is_param": true,
    "key": "port",
    "key_type": "integer",
    "lookup_values_count": 0,
    "override": false,
    "path": "fqdn\nhostgroup\nos\ndomain",
    "puppetclass_id": null,
    "required": false,
    "updated_at": "2014-08-07T20:40:10Z",
    "validator_rule": null,
    "validator_type": null
  }
}
